meanings.sent1: The cake she baked was specialer than the one from the store.
meanings.sent2: She felt specialer when she received a handwritten letter.
meanings.sent3: His attempt to juggle while riding a unicycle was specialer than his actual juggling skills.
meanings.sent4: The bond between the two friends was specialer than any other friendship.
meanings.sent5: The rare gemstone was specialer than any other in the collection.

meanings.sent1: She always strives to be the specialer in the group.
meanings.sent2: The specialer of the two gifts was the handmade one.
meanings.sent3: The race for who could be the specialer in the class was on.
meanings.sent4: Being the specialer in the family comes with its own set of responsibilities.
meanings.sent5: The specialer of the two paintings caught everyone's attention.
